Text:
really!!
How difficult is it too just mention whether a 1080p version will be available or not!!!!

Come on,people its not too much to ask for!!!
Just becoz this is done for free doesn't mean that all downloaders should do is pick up whatever is thrown infront of them and then just pucker up and kiss ass with a thank you.
And i know this comment is going to attract some shit from from YIFY kiss-asses but all i have to say to that is "BITE ME".....!!

Hey godking movies this movie was made in 1994 what the fuck do you care if it's in 1080p or not get the fuck over it.  If you really care about weather or not it's high definition go out and buy it you dick head!!!

As expected-A YIFY kiss-ass has reacted like a rabid dog.
FYI-I do care if its 1080p or not becoz i am a movie collector who not only has a monstrous collection but even makes $1000 a month selling them.
Also as a pirate you shud know that we buy nothing but that doesn't mean that we do not have standards and hence expect the same from reliable uploaders like YIFY.
But i am sure that all this is too difficult for a dog to understand.

Lets see how many more react............waiting.......!

Your standards require Yify to make more torrents for unappreciative assholes that don't deserve to get downloads in the first place not everybody needs the 1080p releases. Notice how the top seeded torrents of yify's are the 720p ones unless they are the big movies of the year like the avengers seriously if your gonna troll take it somewhere else you douche.

Listen you criten:-
yes i notice that and thats just becoz small dicks like you have small bandwidths and small hard disks.
But real collectors,movie fans,winners and money minters want 1080p versions and thats why YIFY upgraded to it and provides 1080p versions of all good movies and 95% of his rips and even 3D rips.

Now this is a gud movie and so he shud have atleast specified whether a 1080p is coming or not.

Dnt bark about what you dont understand- motherfucker.
and as i said "BITE ME",ie,if you can!!!!!!

@Damitttttt: I totally agree, I usually prefer to get the 720p one because of the smaller file size (500-800mb) but I downloaded the avengers in 1080p just because it was that good when I saw it in the cinema.

Oh and @GodKingMovies, you actually make $$ out of pirated movies? Well all I can say is damn you to hell and go fuck yourself since it is because of people like you that people like us have to deal with dmca, sopa and all that bullshit. If people who download torrents would just keep it to themselves or share it for free instead of selling it, the government wouldn't have bothered with all this.

Thanks YifY!

GodKingMovies, if you're such a collector, why do you have no uploads? Even though you were thankful to get them for free, you sell them instead of continuing the sharing???  What a jerk.

GodKingMovies could you just not ask if the 1080 was to come instead of getting all retarded on us and spreading your poison, then again when dealing with children you have to expect childish behavior
Cheers for the up YIFY

See........as expected a lot of Kiss-asses replied

BIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIITTTTTTTTTTEEEE MEEEEEEEEEEEEE
